name: Xinyuan Real Estate Co., Ltd.
description: Xinyuan Real Estate Co., Ltd. is a leading real estate developer based in China, focusing primarily on residential and commercial properties. Established in 1997, the company has developed a robust portfolio of projects across various cities in China, including Beijing, Shanghai, and Xi'an. Xinyuan aims to provide high-quality living spaces and commercial environments that cater to the needs of modern urban life. The company’s strategic focus is on developing large-scale residential communities, offering a range of amenities and services that enhance the quality of life for its residents. In addition to its core residential development business, Xinyuan is also involved in property management, investment, and real estate financing. The company leverages its extensive experience and local market knowledge to identify lucrative opportunities in the rapidly evolving Chinese real estate market. With a commitment to sustainability and innovation, Xinyuan is dedicated to creating value for its shareholders, clients, and the communities in which it operates. As the real estate sector in China continues to grow and evolve, Xinyuan is well-positioned to capitalize on emerging trends and to expand its footprint both domestically and internationally.

seo.meta_title: Xinyuan Real Estate Co., Ltd. | Leading Real Estate Developer in China
seo.meta_description: Explore Xinyuan Real Estate Co., Ltd., a major player in the Chinese real estate market focusing on high-quality residential and commercial properties.

faq.question: What does Xinyuan Real Estate do?
faq.answer: Xinyuan Real Estate develops residential and commercial properties in China.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Xinyuan Real Estate?
faq.answer: Yong Zhang is the CEO of Xinyuan Real Estate Co., Ltd.

faq.question: Where is Xinyuan headquartered?
faq.answer: Xinyuan is headquartered in Beijing, China.

faq.question: What types of properties does Xinyuan develop?
faq.answer: Xinyuan develops high-rise apartments, luxury villas, office buildings, and shopping centers.
